Vegetarian food, travel, kids & photography. New book: Green Kitchen At Home ‚úåüèª

posts.description:
Things I learned from our 'Green Kitchen At Home' cooking class at @surlatable in New York today. 
1. I talk way too much. 
2. I take credit for Luise's brilliance at least once every five minutes. 
3. This pilaf salad took a lot longer for our attendees to prepare than we thought it would. 
4. It was apparently still everyone's favorite. 
5. Having three assistants cleaning up your mess is dangerously addictive. 
6. My hand writing is just as ugly as when I signed my very first book. 
7. Our readers are the kindest of people.

There are only a few spots left for my hands-on cooking class at @surlatable in Los Angeles on Friday May 5th. I've left a link in my profile in case you would like to listen to me ramble about vegetables, cook together and hang out. 
Just 2 days until our book is out in the US!
#greenkitchenathome

Fun day strolling around NYC with these two. If you're in town, we'll be over at @capbeautydaily on Monday evening between 7-9 pm, signing our new book, doing a little Q&A and chatting away. Don't miss out! It's a free event, just RSVP on the link in my profile.

Yay, we have just arrived in New York! üóΩLooking forward to a day of eating out tomorrow. Please hit us with your favorite spots! 
First thing we saw when getting off the plane was this little piece about us and our new book up on @voguemagazine's website. Crazy days! There is a link to it in my profile. üí•üéâ‚ö°Ô∏è

This green pea falafel bowl is fresh up on the blog. Along with more info and rsvp links to the events for our US book launch next week - NYC, SF and LA ‚úàÔ∏èüóΩüá∫üá∏ Link to the blog post in my profile.

These green pea falafels will hit the blog tomorrow! On a completely different note. We just booked tickets to spend a few days in Rome in August. It will be exactly 10 years since I met Luise there. A lot has happened since then. This time we will have three kids with us.

Made this carrot cake oatmeal for breakfast this morning. Added some additional blueberries in the bottom of the pan. Good stuff. It's been a family favorite for years so we included the recipe in our new book.
Quickest Friday night treat. Crunchy + creamy üëåüèª

This veggie packed pasta salad with avocado pesto dressing is from our new book Green Kitchen At Home which lands in book stores all over the U.K. tomorrow! Thank you to all of you who've already received it and said kind things about it. Makes us happy happy! If you use the #greenkitchenathome hashtag when you are cooking from it, we can follow along and comment back easier. Big love! ‚ù§Ô∏è PS. For those of you asking about foreign editions,  German, Dutch, French, Swedish, Danish and Norwegian are confirmed so far. We don't have any exact release dates yet but most of them will come out around August/September.

All the heart emojis for roasted potatoes. We had these with roasted eggplant and sweet potato, quick fried spinach and black beans and a large dollop of ajvar. A decent Tuesday night dinner (even if our kids played the invisible game with the spinach).
Happy birthday @luisegreenkitchenstories! Wife to-be, super mom and queen of everything! We love you! ‚ù§Ô∏èüéÅüéâüéäüéà
One of my favorite shots from last year. Our dark purple salad. üåë

We've teamed up with the organic Swedish brand Kung Markatta and developed a vegetarian BBQ special for them. We are covering everything from this impressive BBQ tray to burgers, cauliflower steaks, flatbreads and easy grilled lettuce. Head over to @kungmarkatta1983 for a link to the recipes (in Swedish). #kungmarkatta #sponsored
Slow morning with home-painted tattoos, thick slices of banana bread and hugging contests.
Baking Broccoli, Spinach & Apple Muffins from our new book tonight. I don't like talking up recipes too much but these muffins are gooood. Book is out in two weeks. #greenkitchenathome

Love this shot of our Berry & Fennel Smoothie from our smoothie book. Green Kitchen Smoothies has just been released in üá´üá∑, üá®üá¶ and üá™üá∏ ‚Äì so happy and proud. Sant√©! Salud! 
For those of you that have been asking about an Italian edition. Unfortunately there isn't one (yet) but please keep on mentioning it and maybe there will be one üòâ. Would love to come back to Italy and do a book signing or workshop. Mi manca Italia!!
